name: Protagonist
heading: Player Character
appearance: Young adventurer, determined expression. Warm brown hair, bright eyes full of wonder.

name: Hana
heading: Hana (Mentor / Workshop Keeper)
appearance: Mid-30s woman, sage green traveler's clothes, satchel, hair tied back. Warm, steady expression.

name: Artun
heading: Artun (Village Elder)
appearance: Elderly man, tall and thin. Dark warm brown coat, walking stick, white hair. Wise, measured gaze.

name: Nel
heading: Nel (Ridge Guide)
appearance: Weathered, lean. Gray-brown cloak, climbing rope coiled at hip, wind-tanned skin. Stoic expression with kind eyes.

name: Elder Torin
appearance: Elderly man, tall and thin. Long white beard, warm brown robes, wooden walking stick. Wise eyes.
